div.p: Bloomington Public Schools are closed through the end of the school year. Grab and go meal distribution for all Bloomington students 18 and younger, and childcare for healthcare and essential workers, is available on all scheduled school days.

div.div: Video shows students and teachers in classrooms.

div.p: Our community values small, neighborhood schools where family involvement is welcomed and staff, students and families build strong, caring relationships.
Every student creates a Personal Growth Plan in middle school to guide their high school planning and augment learning about life skills and post secondary options.
We challenge and inspire all learners to achieve their highest potential with culturally relevant, rigorous academics, engaging experiences and innovative programs.
We offer Computer Science Immersion at two elementary schools and computer science lessons at all levels to ensure all students learn the skills they'll need in today's world.
